email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Reset Your Google 2FA Now

Dear Valued Google User,

We are writing to inform you that our system has detected some unusual activity on your Google account recently. In order to ensure the security of your account and personal information, we kindly ask you to reset your Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) settings as soon as possible.

Please click on the following link to reset your 2FA: [Phishing link]

Failure to reset your 2FA within the next 24 hours may result in the suspension of your Google account. We understand that this may be an inconvenience, but your security is our top priority.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
The Google Security Team
